TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Oro’raw, title = Oro’raw, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oro’raw} }

S.FORM: alang Oro'raw ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Gpho go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 40 buwan, 108 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 90% kyan ku 97 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 10% kyan ku 11 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, saySiyat 77%, Tayan 11%, Amis 2%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Oro'raw hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na Oro'raw hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Oro'raw hya' llyung. tay mkraya' na Oro'raw hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'llaw na Oro'raw hya' ga R'ra'. tay 'zil na Oro'raw hya' ga Kyu'ang. rekisi kayal qmisan lga, hzyaq balay maki' te rgyax hiya'. kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Oro'raw ga niya mki sko Sincik Keng ato Gpho go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 40 bowan, 108 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 90% kyan ko 97 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 10% kyan ko 11 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, saySiyat 77%, Tayan 11%, Amis 2%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Oro'raw hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na Oro'raw hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Oro'raw hya' llyong. tay mkraya' na Oro'raw hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'llaw na Oro'raw hya' ga R'ra'. tay 'zil na Oro'raw hya' ga Kyo'ang. rekisi kayal qmisan lga, hzyaq balay maki' te rgyax hiya'. kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
